title: Wish List
description: Be careful what you wish for!When Buddy Pancake and his drinking buddies stumble across the Wish List website, they jokingly post their “impossible” wishes. Imagine their surprise when, one by one, the wishes start coming true! But Buddy and his pals neglected to read the fine print explaining the price they must pay for the wishes they’ve been granted.Wish list is a compelling, nail-biting, laugh-out-loud thriller in the tradition of Saving Rachel.
author: John  Locke
